name: decstr_resets_scroll_region
description: DECSTR resets scroll region to full screen; IND at bottom scrolls entire screen
comment: Fill A-E in rows 0-4. DECSTBM(2,3) restricts region. DECSTR soft-resets (region → full screen). CUP(5,1) → (4,0). IND scrolls full screen: row 0←B, row 1←C, row 2←D, row 3←E, row 4←blank. Print 'Z' at (4,0).
